extendedInfo.description: My Home is another home replacement besides ADW, Launcher pro etc. Inspired by iphone and windows phone. The goal is to make a full featured launcher in small size while keep user interface clean, flexible and highly configurable. It has iphone style app drawer and allow you to customize widgets screen to windows phone style. Tested on Nexus devices.Please see below for quick tips. Help and FAQ can be found at http://goo.gl/oJlF3If you need help to use this app, please email me directly and I am glad to help.Please search "pub:Farmer" for full version and other themes as well.Major features:Iphone-ish folder in app drawer;Unlimited folder nesting;Arbitrary custom layout (not just MxN) for app drawer (in paid version);Support ADW, LauncherPro, Apex and Go icon pack (in paid version);App badge support including Gmail, calendar, missed call, weather, Facebook and so on;Better shadow for app icons;Unique widget option including crop, background/border color to help you make windows phone style home screen;Pin widget option to help you make dock bar in widgets screen;Unique app icon rotation in app drawer.Quick tips:Press menu then choose 'My settings' to access 'My Home' specific options;Press and hold on any app or widget to enter edit mode;In edit mode, tap red-pencil icon to open options for an app or widget;In app drawer, enter edit mode first, then press and hold on any app and drag to other app to make a folder;In app drawer, enter edit mode first, then drag app out of folder area for ~1 seconds to move the app out of folder;Press back to scroll to first page;

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Could be better,but a good start..
reviews.author: dianne gallardo

reviews.title: Good ideas
reviews.comment: Got it set up after a while to my liking but was a pain to figure out. Settings could use an easier layout and many animations are buggy.
reviews.author: Ryan Wystepek

reviews.title: better!
reviews.comment: 5 stars for the devs obvious imput of work. I no longer get blue backgrounds and folders work perfectly. the widget screen is pretty useless, I want them mixed with my main page, but I can live with it for now. lightweight iOS-ish desktop.
reviews.author: Zaher Thompson

reviews.title: Laggy..
reviews.comment: sometime the homescreen just disappear, and have to buy the full version if want to change theme. Big NO!!
reviews.author: yadi ginanjar

reviews.title: baaaad
reviews.comment: dude did you try it before you uploading it because it sucks!!!
reviews.author: salam mithak

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Works perfect
reviews.author: Aaron Galloway

reviews.title: Bad Launcher, No Preferences
reviews.comment: Lags, more lags and lags, and I have a SGS3! No app drawer and even no option to sort icons inside folder by name, recent install, or usage. Don\'t waste you time with this. Looks good on Play Store preview, definitely bad on your phone.
reviews.author: Dwi Elfianto

reviews.title: Needs work.
reviews.comment: I love the simplicity of it, but I have no idea how to get to the app\'s settings. Also I can\'t figure out how to add widgets though the description says you can it should probably tell you how. And it took me forever to arrange my apps since it arranges them in no specific order. But it moves pretty fast on my phone. Still not that great.
reviews.author: IKara Wagner

reviews.title: Its a good, lightweight launcher.
reviews.comment: It needs preference settings. Can\'t figure out how to get apps in alphabetical order.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t have what I need.
reviews.comment: No app drawer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super good
reviews.comment: Exlent

reviews.title: Fix please
reviews.comment: Please fix the notification, although there are no unread msg, but the notification still shown up.One more, please give users choice to choose the colour of font and size of font. Other thing, very well.

reviews.title: NQR
reviews.comment: Nice app. But FC most of the time. Missing icons on screen. Lacks of instruction on how to use the app(figure it out at last)

reviews.title: No...
reviews.comment: The idea is good, but scrolling is slow and icon organization is a mess, I\'m unable to remove an accidentally created folder!

reviews.title: Reflections on dock look weird
reviews.comment: Why are the reflections not on the dock? The dock looks out of place as the reflections are not lined up with it.

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy tab 7\"
reviews.comment: Garbage. No widget support whatsoever.

reviews.title: It\'s okay
reviews.comment: My problem with it is that it\'s really hard to make folders. That\'s the only problem with it though. Everything else is nice. But...I love organizing my apps into folders so...uninstalling :/

reviews.title: Looks bad on QVGA devices
